subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Tim McCarver, the winner of the annual Ford C. Frick Award for broadcasting, has a style that blends a veteran catcher’s experience with historical references and groan-worthy puns.
snippet: Tim McCarver, the winner of the annual Ford C. Frick Award for broadcasting, has a style that blends a veteran catcher’s experience with historical references and groan-worthy puns.
